high_descs: Move to the round table in the back right corner of the room
Pick up the remote on top of the table
Carry the remote over to the large brown sofa facing the right side of the sofa
Place the remote on top of the sofa on the right side
anns.task_desc: Place a remote on the sofa

high_descs: pick up the remote from the table
take the remote to the couch
put the remote on the couch
anns.task_desc: take the remote from the table to the couch

high_descs: Go forward, go to the right to the window, hang a left, go to the garbage can, turn to the left to face the dining table.
Pick up the remote control that is on the table.
Turn to the left, cross the room, go to the couch that is on the right.
Put the remote control on the couch.
anns.task_desc: Put a remote control on a couch.
